page.title: 02THE TOTAL AREA (2)
page.content: AT THE SEWAGE WORKS THEY CLEAN THE WATER.AT HIGH CANONS THEY DO A LOT OF FILMING.THEY FILM THINGS LIKE THE AVENGERS AND THE PROFESINALS.HIGH CANONS IS A VERY BIG MANSION WHICH IS IN BUCKETS LAND LANE.BY BIGNAL'S CORNER ROUNDABOUT THERE'S A MOTEL CALLED THE CREST MOTEL WHICH IS VERY COMFORTABLE.DEEVES HALL IN RIDGE IS VERY OLD,TO BE EXACT IT WAS BUILT IN THE LATE FIFTEENTH CENTURY,TO BE EXACT FOURTEEN EIGHTY FIVE.AT THE BOTTOM OF CROSSOAKS LANE THERE IS A CANCER RESEARCH CENTRE.IT WAS BUILT IN THE PLACE OF CLARE HALL ISOLATION HOSPITAL.IN RIDGE THERE IS A VERY OLD CHURCH WHICH HAS BEEN STANDING SINCE THE EARLY FIFTEENTH CENTURY.THE CHURCH IS CALLED ST.MARGRETS CHURCH.DEEVES HALL COTTAGE IS AN OLD RACING CAR RE_CONSTRUCTION SITE FOR FORMULA FOUR RACING CARS.
